name: crm-connector
description: Manage CRM contacts, leads, and activity logs via provider client. Supports Salesforce/HubSpot-style operations through injected client.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: crm_connector
toolDefinition.description: Manage CRM contacts, leads, and activity logs via provider client. Supports Salesforce/HubSpot-style operations (BYOK).

action.description: find_contact (search contacts), create_lead (create a new lead), add_log (add activity log to contact), list_deals (list deals with optional status filter)

query.description: Search query for contacts. Required for find_contact.

leadData.description: JSON lead data with name, email, company fields. Required for create_lead. Can be a JSON string or object.

logContent.description: Activity log content. Required for add_log.

status.description: Filter deals by status: all, open, won, lost. Optional for list_deals, defaults to 'all'.
